emailTemplate.subject: AutoSubmit Job Failure Notice
emailTemplate.message:
The AutoSubmit job encountered errors during processing and had to skip ${failureCount} attempts/submissions. The remaining attempts/submissions were processed successfully.
Manual intervention may be required to correct these issues. For further details, see the logs.
emailTemplate.messagehtml:
The AutoSubmit job encountered errors during processing and had to skip ${failureCount} attempts/submissions. The remaining attempts/submissions were processed successfully.

Manual intervention may be required to correct these issues. For further details, see the logs.
